reviewText: Got because Julio is in....but it is not like La vida sigue igual....

Lo compre simplemente para recordar esta pelicula que ya habia visto cuando joven y me hizo recordar cosas del pasado.  Tambien tuve la oportunidad de gozar de Issa Lorenz, la protagonista que hizo de novia de Julio Iglesias.  Ella todo el tiempo me ha gustado, y me sorprende mucho que no haya seguido su carrera como actriz.

I went on line to get a DVD on one of his concerts, and this had the best reviews and price--forget the concert--buy popcorn and watch this movie instead which is what it really is.  And--a really "C" movie at that.  He is still a great singer in my book, but "Julio", thanks for staying a singer.  Would I ask someone else to purchase this???  No, and I do not have any enemies to pay back by asking them to buy it.
